string.name: photopicker_profile_primary_label
string.translation_description: Display name of the primary device user profile.

string.name: photopicker_profile_managed_label
string.translation_description: Display name of the managed (work) device user profile.

string.name: photopicker_profile_unknown_label
string.translation_description: Display name of a device user profile whose type is not known.

string.name: photopicker_profile_switch_button_description
string.translation_description: Button accessibility description for switching user profiles

string.name: photopicker_profile_unavailable_dialog_title
string.translation_description: Dialog title stating a user profile cannot be switched to due to it being unavailable.

string.name: photopicker_profile_blocked_by_admin_dialog_title
string.translation_description: Dialog title stating a user profile cannot be switched to due to admin policy.

string.name: photopicker_profile_unavailable_dialog_message
string.translation_description: Dialog message stating a user profile cannot be switched to due to it being unavailable.

resources.string: To open %1$s photos turn on your %1$s apps, then try again

string.name: photopicker_profile_blocked_by_admin_dialog_message
string.translation_description: Dialog title stating a user profile cannot be switched to due to it being unavailable.

resources.string: Accessing data from this profile is not permitted by your administrator.
